wikipedia_page.main: Clive Peter Green (born 6 December 1959) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League as a forward for Portsmouth. He also played non-league football for clubs including Yeovil Town, Maidstone United, Croydon, Dover Athletic and Salisbury.

response: * Clive Green, professional footballer Portsmouth F.C., Yeovil Town and Maidstone United. England Under-18 schoolboys.
